title: Jaden Hardy joins J & J's Draft Day Show
description:
The biggest day of the year for the world's best prospects, and the league's worst teams is upon us! Jalen & Jacoby break down the top of this draft class: Jabari Smith, Chet Holmgren, and Paulo Banchero. They also talk about a Nets team that is suddenly on the brink, Ayton's standoff with the Suns, they give you their sleepers, and interview future NBA Star Jaden Hardy about his path from the G-League Ignite to Barclay's center stage. Tap in! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
